== The Lord of the Rings [Special Extended DVD Edition] ==
* Contains 12 DVDs in DVD9 format (IFO/VOB).
* Unabridged. (Parental Management and FBI warnings removed.)
* English.

== Table of Contents ==
* FELLOWSHIP_EXT_D1 - First Movie Disk One
* FELLOWSHIP_EXT_D2 - First Movie Disk Two
* FELLOWSHIP_EXT_D3 - "The Appendices Part One: From Book to Vision"
* FELLOWSHIP_EXT_D4 - "The Appendices Part Two: From Vision to Reality"

* TWO_TOWERS_EXT_D1 - Second Movie Disk One
* TWO_TOWERS_EXT_D2 - Second Movie Disk Two
* TWO_TOWERS_EXT_D3 - "The Appendices Part Three: The Journey Continues..."
* TWO_TOWERS_EXT_D4 - "The Appendices Part Four: The Battle for Middle Earth Begins"

* RETURN_KING_EXT_D1 - Third Movie Disk One
* RETURN_KING_EXT_D2 - Third Movie Disk Two
* RETURN_KING_EXT_D3 - "The Appendices Part Five: The War of the Ring"
* RETURN_KING_EXT_D4 - "The Appendices Part Six: The Passing of an Age"

== Features: The Fellowship of the Ring ==
* Audio (All English):
* Doby Digital EX 5.1 Surround Sound
* DTS ES 6.1 Surround Sound
* Stereo Surround Sound
* Audio Commentary (Director and Writers)
* Audio Commentary (Design Team)
* Audio Commentary (Production/Post-Production Team)
* Audio Commentary (Cast)

* Subtitles:
* English

== Features: The Two Towers ==
* Audio (All English):
* Dolby Digital EX 5.1 Surround Sound
* DTS ES 6.1 Surround Sound
* Stereo Surround Sound
* Audio Commentary (Director and Writers)
* Audio Commentary (Design Team)
* Audio Commentary (Production/Post-Production Team)
* Audio Commentary (Cast)

* Subtitles:
* English
* Spanish

== Features: The Return of the King ==
* Audio (All English):
* Dolby Digital EX 5.1 Surround Sound
* DTS ES 6.1 Surround Sound
* Stereo Surround Sound
* Audio Commentary (Director and Writers)
* Audio Commentary (Design Team)
* Audio Commentary (Production/Post-Production Team)
* Audio Commentary (Cast)

* Subtitles:
* English
* Spanish

== Viewing ==
* Use a media player such as VideoLAN: http://www.videolan.org/
* To burn, use a program like Nero, and consult the program's documentation.

== Notes ==
* Disks 3 and 4 of each set ("The Appendices") are the pure extras DVDs. The movies themselves are on disks 1 and 2 of each set.
* If you like these movies, buy them!

== Credits ==
* Ripped, prepared, and uploaded by AnarkiNet -
